title: Augmented Reality-Based Acoustic System Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic acoustic system components and secondary education field experience
context.additional_context: Augmented reality-based sound system training course for in-service music teachers. Blended learning design implementable in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can visualize the functional relationships of acoustic system components in a three-dimensional space using augmented reality tools.
Learners can explain the installation and operation procedures of acoustic equipment step-by-step through AR simulations.
Learners can reproduce the functions and applications of acoustic system components with over 80% accuracy four weeks after an augmented reality learning experience.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
